name: City Fire Fighter Rescue Truck Sim
name_original: City Fire Fighter Rescue Truck Sim
description: Fire Fighter Truck is to help the city to extinguish burning buildings and vehicles. All the city is in flames your duty is to rescue lives just like rescue 911. Use your siren to aware everyone about the disaster. You are the fire-fighter of this city. Rush to the scene and put out the blaze. You have to reach the fire and get control on it as soon as possible.
